title: SCP-001-EL - AGS's Proposal
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
SCP-001-EL - AGS's Proposal
**Author:** [[*user zAGSz]]
**Translator:** [[*user Neatpicky]]
**Original Article:** [http://scp-el.wikidot.com/protasi-tou-ags SCP-001-EL - Œó Œ†œÅœåœÑŒ±œÉŒ∑ œÑŒøœÖ AGS]

Images used:
* https://www.pxfuel.com/en/free-photo-ikrcy - EM-152
* https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:BLANK_in_Europe_(relief).svg - ŒòŒ≠œÉŒ∑ œÑŒøœÖ SCP-001-EL (Modified by author.)
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt]]

:root {
    --title: "THE EM LAB";
    --subtitle: "TO KEEP US ALL SAFE";
}

[[/module]]
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Staatliches&display=swap');

.transcript {
    padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    width: 80%;
    margin: auto;
    background: url("http://sandboxscp-el.wdfiles.com/local--files/zagsz/EL") rgb(253, 253, 253);
    background-size: contain;
    background-position: top center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-opacity: 0.0;
    border: dotted 1px #5D5D5D;
    border-radius: 10px;
}
[[/module]]

@@ @@

[[div class="transcript"]]
[[=]]
+ [[size 110%]] ##900|**__WARNING__**## [[/size]]
+++ **The following document requires security clearance level 5/001-EL.**
[[/=]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px black; background:black; padding:1px; margin-bottom: 1px;"]]
[[/div]]

{{Anyone who has access to the following document through an unknown network is subject to arrest and interrogation by agents of the Foundation. If you do not have the necessary permission, leave this document immediately.}}
[[/div]]
[[=]]
[[Collapsible show="+ ACCESS DOCUMENT" hide="- EXIT DOCUMENT"]]
[[/=]]
[[<]]
----
[[module CSS]]
.email-example .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link {
    animation: blink 0.8s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}
@keyframes blink {
    0% { color: transparent; }
    50%, 100% { color: #b01; }
}
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

**ITEM NUMBER:** SCP-001-EL

**OBJECT CLASS:** Keter

**SPECIAL CONTAINMENT PROCEDURES:** SCP-001-EL is being surveilled by Site-01. A surveillance team has been formed to confirm and report any changes related to the object. If the object emits light from its yellowish material, the surveillance team must update the on-site directors.

As soon as SCP-001-EL stops shining, the surveillance team must look for anomalies that form on the surface of the object. After the entity or the artifact lands at an abandoned location or vanishes from view, a containment AKM from the nearest Site must go to the location to contain and record the anomaly. If anomalies do not emerge out of SCP-001-EL, search for other anomalies except entities and artifacts must ensue.

[[include component:image-block
| name=http://scp-el.wikidot.com/local--files/protasi-tou-ags/%CE%A7%CE%AC%CF%81%CF%84%CE%B7%CF%82
| caption=The current location of SCP-001-EL.
| width=300px
| align=right]]

**DESCRIPTION:** SCP-001-EL is the designation of a celestial body that is currently in the thermosphere, in a mountainous area north of the region of Epirus in Greece. The object appears to have an imperfect spherical shape, with a diameter of about 12.4 km. Its interior consists of an unknown material that absorbs 83.3% of light, and is almost completely covered by another unknown material, yellowish and extremely radioactive.

The object emits approximately 354,400 Sv of ionizing radiation, although the gamma waves do not extend beyond a radius of 680 meters from the surface of SCP-001-EL. They are obstructed by an invisible anomalous natural boundary, which consists of a peripheral area about 13 km in diameter that follows the location of the anomaly in a specific area where it is located.

In a period of about 72 hours, a light source is emitted by SCP-001-EL, which lasts for about 3 hours. At the last hour, the glow stops and an artifact or random entity is formed from the black material inside the object, which is moved by an unknown controlling force to a random area of ‚Äã‚ÄãGreece or Cyprus, where it usually settles in areas not inhabited by humans. Studies show that the formation or activation of abnormal positions in Greece and Cyprus occurred at the same time that the brightness was transmitted by SCP-001-EL, at a different time within the period of 72 hours.

Some anomalies formed by SCP-001-EL can be found on the Foundation's registered anomalies page.

SCP-001-EL was discovered after a series of anomalies was documented by the SCP Foundation in some areas of Greece and Cyprus. Due to these huge new records of anomalies, the Greek SCP Foundation was created to control anomalies in these areas.

**SUPPLEMENTARY DOCUMENT 001-EL-1:** The anomaly was first discovered by the EM Lab (acronym "Ektoras Megalos")[[footnote]] Group of Interest of the Greek SCP Foundation. It is an independent organization founded by Ektoras Megalos, before the establishment of the Greek SCP Foundation. The team was responsible for studying and recording the anomalies of the time. [[/footnote]] ,on 04/09/1986, where it was found in a compact size after a mission carried out by members of the Group of Interest in a touristic cave at ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà.

At the date of discovery of the anomaly by the Laboratory, the anomalous effects of the object were classified as safe.

The following document refers to SCP-001-EL, and was found in the EM Lab database.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=+ DOCUMENT RECOVERED FROM EM LAB
| hide=- CLOSE DOCUMENT
]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px black; background:#212121; padding:6px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
+ ##00BFFF|EM LAB##
[[/=]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px black; background:#00BFFF; padding:1px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[include component:image-block
| name= https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/966656939977216060/972528575565668442/IMG_6065.jpg
| aling=left
| width=300px
| caption= EM-152
]]

##00BFFF|**{{OBJECT #:## ##white|EM-152**##
}}

##00BFFF|**{{CLASSIFICATION:## ##white|Artifact**}}##

##00BFFF|**{{THREAT LEVEL:## ##00FF7F|3**}}##

##00BFFF|**{{SIZE:## ##white|40 meters in diameter ##**}}

##00BFFF|**{{CONTAINMENT PROCEDURES:## ##white|EM-152 must be stored in a cardboard box. Other studies on the artifact and its anomalous effects are in progress.
**}}##

{{##00BFFF|**DESCRIPTION:## ##white| EM-152 is formed by a black floating sphere, which is covered by a gold-like material over a large area of its surface.**##}}

{{##white|**People 4 meters away from the object are occupied by an overwhelming desire to destroy the artifact, telling it to ‚Äúbe released.‚Äù As soon as the person affected by the effects of the anomaly leaves his range, his desire to destroy the object stops completely.**##}}

##00BFFF|**{{DISCOVERY:}}**## ##white|**{{We discovered EM-152 on a wooden altar, after an archeological mission carried out by members of the EM-331-Œ£ team. The object affected most members of the group. The personnel who were not affected contacted the Central Lab reporting the anomaly found.}}**##

[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=+ INCIDENT REPORT
| hide=- CLOSE INCIDENT REPORT
]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px black; background:#212121; padding:1px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
+ ##00BFFF|REPORT##
[[/=]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px black; background:#00BFFF; padding:1px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{20/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{EM-152 suddenly started affecting people from a distance of 10 meters.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{21/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{EM-152 suddenly started affecting people from a distance of 25 meters.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{24/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{The object began to glow steadily.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{25/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{The size of EM-152 has changed. At present, it has a diameter of 1.5 meters.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{26/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{Several entities began to emerge from EM-152. Organisms are defective, none of the living creatures formed by EM-152 have a human or healthy form.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{28/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{The first entities created by EM-152 died naturally. However, other, more perfect organisms are emerging from EM-152.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{29/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{The containment chamber of EM-152 was found to be damaged and the object was missing.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{30/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{EM-152 was found about 500 kilometers above Research Zone-04, having adopted a giant size.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{30/09/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{EM-152 creates anomalies that are constantly moved to a location in Greece by an unknown force.}}**##

[[size 85%]]##00BFFF|**{{2/10/1986}}**##[[/size]]
##white|**{{EM-152 emits a yellowish glow from the material before creating an anomaly. More studies are being done on this phenomenon.}}**##
[[/<]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]





[[div class="email-example"]]

------
[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=Open SCiPNET Email? One (1) new message!
| hide=Re:EM-152
]]


[[<]]
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**TO:** Ektoras Megalos [[size 85%]]{{E‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**FROM:** Leandros Antoniou [[size 85%]]{{‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**SUBJECT:** Containment breach from EM-152
[[/div]]
------

Good morning, Ektoras. I'm the director of Research Zone 04. I'm sending this email to say that EM-152 has breached the containment procedures, escaping and destroying much of our base.

Remember those little entities that came out of this artifact? They started appearing near Zone 04 and we still don‚Äôt know where they come from and how they evolved so much. Many other artifacts were also recorded by the Lab. All this happened after the disappearance of the EM-152.
[[size 85%]]10/06/1986[[/size]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**TO:** Leandros Antoniou [[size 75%]]{{‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**FROM:** Ektoras Megalos [[size 75%]]{{E‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**SUBJECT:** RE:Containment breach by EM-152
[[/div]]
------

Thanks for telling me. I have some solutions to these problems in Research Zone 04, but I prefer to discuss them in person. I‚Äôll be there in a few days, I‚Äôm currently at Base-213.

Ektoras.

[[size 85%]]10/06/1986[[/size]]


[[/div]]
@@ @@

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**TO:** Leandros Antoniou  [[size 75%]]{{‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**FROM:** Ektoras Megalos [[size 75%]]{{E‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**SUBJECT:** I‚Äôm here.
[[/div]]
------

There is no one at Zone-04. I will be going to Base-41 now, answer me when you can.


[[size 85%]]15/06/1986[[/size]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+++++ ##900|NEW MESSAGE!##
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**TO:** Ektoras Megalos [[size 75%]]{{E‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**FROM:** Leandros Antoniou [[size 75%]]{{‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà@gmail.com}}[[/size]]
**SUBJECT:** [...]
[[/div]]
------

Sorry for the delay in reply. We were welcomed by members of the "SCP Foundation". It‚Äôs basically a global organization that does what we do, studying and documenting anomalies.

They have a proposal between the Lab and the Foundation. They can tell you more about it. We are at Base-47, please come, sir.

[[size 85%]]16/6/1986[[/size]]

[[/div]]


[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:colend]]

----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:coltop
| show=+ TRANSCRIBED INTERVIEW FILE
| hide=- CLOSE
]]
[[<]]
> **INTERVIEWED:** Ektoras Megalos
> 
> **INTERVIEWER:** O5-‚ñà
> ----
> [[=]]
> **<BEGIN LOG>**
> [[/=]]
> ----
> **O5-‚ñà:** Good morning.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** Hey. Good morning.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Did you create the EM Lab?
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** Yeah.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** I like your job. I respect you.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** Thanks. But, sorry, who are you, and why am I here?
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** I am one of the overseers of the SCP Foundation. We are an organization responsible for recording and studying anomalous artifacts, entities, places and events.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** ‚Ä¶Understood.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Basically, we do the same job as your Lab. Now, could you tell me, how many anomalies have you documented so far?
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** We‚Äôve documented about 500, give or take.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Do you know about‚Ä¶
> 
> //O5-‚ñà picks up some pieces of paper.//
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** ŒïŒú-152?
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** A personnel member informed me about the condition of this object. Now, what did you do with the men in the lab?
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** We brought some of them here to ask some questions, but we‚Äôve let them out.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** Understood.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** When EM-152 escaped, multiple anomalies appeared in Greece, some in Cyprus. With all these reports of anomalies, we have mobilized more troops here to try to keep the population safe. There are many anomalies that have been recorded in these areas. We need help.
> 
> //O5-‚ñà gets a document and hands it over to Ektoras Megalos.//
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Read the document, please.
> 
> //Ektoras reads the document for a few seconds.//
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** What exactly do I get if I accept this?
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** We will help you by distributing all the technology and knowledge we have about some anomalies recorded by the Foundation.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** Why do you want me to accept this?
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** There are many anomalies in these lands due to the EM-152, creating an independent industry for this is more beneficial for us.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** But what would change for me? Would this prevent me from continuing to operate the EM Lab?
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** You won‚Äôt lose anything. Your lab will just acquire more equipment. That‚Äôs it.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** I don‚Äôt know nearly anything about this ‚ÄúSCP Foundation‚Äù. I‚Äôm sorry, but I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll accept it.
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Understood. Good luck with EM-152.
> 
> //Nobody speaks for 5 seconds.//
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** The truth is, we don‚Äôt have enough resources. 
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** ‚Ä¶We could help with that.
> 
> **Ektoras Megalos:** The Lab was created to protect all of us.
> 
> //Nobody speaks for 15 seconds.//
> 
> //Ektoras Megalos signs the document.//
> 
> **O5-‚ñà:** Hope you‚Äôll do some good work, MTF-êÄÄ. 
> ----
> [[=]]
> **<END LOG>**
> [[/=]]
> 
[[/<]]
[[/<]]

[[/collapsible]]
